name: Chef John's Bacon and Asparagus Dutch Baby
author: Chef John
summary: I'm seeing lots of savory, non-breakfast versions of Dutch Babies on menus lately, so I thought I'd try it with this amazing bacon and asparagus version. The best pan to use is a 12-inch cast iron skillet.
ingredients: ½ cup finely grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese (not packed)
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 cup trimmed fresh asparagus, cut into 1/4-inch pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C)
Add milk, grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, flour, lemon zest, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper
Heat 2 teaspoons olive oil in cast-iron skillet over medium heat
Add bacon and cook until fat is rendered out and bacon begins to crisp up
Add asparagus and raise heat to high
Pour batter into pan in a circular motion
Bake in preheated oven until browned and puffed, 12 to 13 minutes
